segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 56
segments.en: Linked Discourses 56

segments.pli: 5. Papātavagga
segments.en: 5. A Cliff

segments.pli: 46. Andhakārasutta
segments.en: 46. Darkness

segments.pli: “Atthi, bhikkhave, lokantarikā aghā asaṃvutā andhakārā andhakāratimisā, yatthamimesaṃ candimasūriyānaṃ evaṃmahiddhikānaṃ evaṃ mahānubhāvānaṃ ābhāya nānubhontī”ti.
segments.en: “Mendicants, the boundless desolation of interstellar space is so utterly dark that even the light of the moon and the sun, so mighty and powerful, makes no impression.”

segments.pli: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: When he said this, one of the mendicants asked the Buddha,

segments.pli: “mahā vata so, bhante, andhakāro, sumahā vata so, bhante, andhakāro.
segments.en: “Sir, that darkness really is mighty, so very mighty.

segments.pli: Atthi nu kho, bhante, etamhā andhakārā añño andhakāro mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā”ti?
segments.en: Is there any other darkness more mighty and terrifying than this one?”

segments.pli: “Atthi kho, bhikkhu, etamhā andhakārā añño andhakāro mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā”ti.
segments.en: “There is, mendicant.”

segments.pli: “Katamo pana, bhante, etamhā andhakārā añño andhakāro mahantataro ca bhayānakataro cā”ti?
segments.en: “But sir, what is it?”

segments.pli: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhu, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti … pe … ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti,
segments.en: “There are ascetics and brahmins who don’t truly understand about suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path.

segments.pli: te jātisaṃvattanikesu saṅkhāresu abhiramanti … pe …
segments.en: They take pleasure in choices that lead to rebirth …

segments.pli: abhiratā … pe … abhisaṅkharonti … pe …
segments.en: They continue to make such choices …

segments.pli: abhisaṅkharitvā jātandhakārampi papatanti, jarandhakārampi papatanti, maraṇandhakārampi papatanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsandhakārampi papatanti.
segments.en: Having made such choices, they fall into the darkness of rebirth, old age, and death, of sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.

segments.pli: Te na parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi.
segments.en: They’re not freed from rebirth, old age, and death, from sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.

segments.pli: ‘Na parimuccanti dukkhasmā’ti vadāmi.
segments.en: They’re not freed from suffering, I say.

segments.pli: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhu, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti … pe … ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti,
segments.en: There are ascetics and brahmins who truly understand about suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path.

segments.pli: te jātisaṃvattanikesu saṅkhāresu nābhiramanti … pe …
segments.en: They don’t take pleasure in choices that lead to rebirth …

segments.pli: anabhiratā … pe … nābhisaṅkharonti … pe …
segments.en: They stop making such choices …

segments.pli: anabhisaṅkharitvā jātandhakārampi nappapatanti, jarandhakārampi nappapatanti, maraṇandhakārampi nappapatanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsandhakārampi nappapatanti.
segments.en: Having stopped making such choices, they don’t fall into the darkness of rebirth, old age, and death, of sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.

segments.pli: Te parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi.
segments.en: They’re freed from rebirth, old age, and death, from sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.

segments.pli: ‘Parimuccanti dukkhasmā’ti vadāmi.
segments.en: They’re freed from suffering, I say.

segments.pli: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yogo karaṇīyo … pe … ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yogo karaṇīyo”ti.
segments.en: That’s why you should practice meditation …”

segments.pli: Chaṭṭhaṃ.

sections.title: “Mendicants, the boundless desolation of interstellar space is so…

suttaplex.blurb: Interstellar space is dark and empty; but not seeing the four noble truths is even worse.
